desc.en: After sending her enraged underclassmen home, Hoshino reveals to Sensei the secret deal she was offered by the man in the black suit. Sensei tries to console her, but the next day finds no trace of Hoshino, save for her resignation letter.
desc.jp: After sending her enraged underclassmen home, Hoshino reveals to Sensei the secret deal she was offered by the man in the black suit. Sensei tries to console her, but the next day finds no trace of Hoshino, save for her resignation letter.
desc.thai: After sending her enraged underclassmen home, Hoshino reveals to Sensei the secret deal she was offered by the man in the black suit. Sensei tries to console her, but the next day finds no trace of Hoshino, save for her resignation letter.
desc.ko: After sending her enraged underclassmen home, Hoshino reveals to Sensei the secret deal she was offered by the man in the black suit. Sensei tries to console her, but the next day finds no trace of Hoshino, save for her resignation letter.
desc.zh_tw: 把气愤的学妹们送回家后，星野把身穿黑西装的男人曾向自己提出秘密交易的事告诉老师。虽然老师替星野打气加油，但隔天星野却留下自动退学书消失踪影。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 把气愤的学妹们送回家后，星野把身穿黑西装的男人曾向自己提出秘密交易的事告诉老师。虽然老师替星野打气加油，但隔天星野却留下自动退学书消失踪影。

desc.en: Hoshino remembered the days with that former Student Union president. That president held a positive view of the future and believed that the future of Abydos would not be just like that. She also gifted a poster of the old festival to Hoshino. But Hoshino cut her down and denied her, ripping apart the poster at hand.
desc.jp: Hoshino remembered the days with that former Student Union president. That president held a positive view of the future and believed that the future of Abydos would not be just like that. She also gifted a poster of the old festival to Hoshino. But Hoshino cut her down and denied her, ripping apart the poster at hand.
desc.thai: Hoshino remembered the days with that former Student Union president. That president held a positive view of the future and believed that the future of Abydos would not be just like that. She also gifted a poster of the old festival to Hoshino. But Hoshino cut her down and denied her, ripping apart the poster at hand.
desc.ko: Hoshino remembered the days with that former Student Union president. That president held a positive view of the future and believed that the future of Abydos would not be just like that. She also gifted a poster of the old festival to Hoshino. But Hoshino cut her down and denied her, ripping apart the poster at hand.
desc.zh_tw: 星野记起了和以前那位学生会会长的事情。那位会长对未来的一切充满希望，认定阿拜多斯的未来并非如此，还将以前庆典的一张海报给了星野。但星野打断并否定了她，还撕烂了手中的海报。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 星野记起了和以前那位学生会会长的事情。那位会长对未来的一切充满希望，认定阿拜多斯的未来并非如此，还将以前庆典的一张海报给了星野。但星野打断并否定了她，还撕烂了手中的海报。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 星野记起了和以前那位学生会会长的事情。那位会长对未来的一切充满希望，认定阿拜多斯的未来并非如此，还将以前庆典的一张海报给了星野。但星野打断并否定了她，还撕烂了手中的海报。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 星野记起了和以前那位学生会会长的事情。那位会长对未来的一切充满希望，认定阿拜多斯的未来并非如此，还将以前庆典的一张海报给了星野。但星野打断并否定了她，还撕烂了手中的海报。

desc.en: Yume is the president of the former Abydos Student Council. She had worked together with Hoshino and holds a positive view of the future (as Hoshino recalls). Her image only appeared once in a photo taken with Hoshino. Currently there's no more information about her, but some suspect that she was dead, as seen in the Chapter 1 and the Volume Final.
desc.jp: Yume is the president of the former Abydos Student Council. She had worked together with Hoshino and holds a positive view of the future (as Hoshino recalls). Her image only appeared once in a photo taken with Hoshino. Currently there's no more information about her, but some suspect that she was dead, as seen in the Chapter 1 and the Volume Final.

Her image only appeared once in a photo taken with Hoshino. Currently there's no more information about her, but some suspect that she was dead, as seen in the Chapter 1 and the Volume Final.
desc.ko: Yume is the president of the former Abydos Student Council. She had worked together with Hoshino and holds a positive view of the future (as Hoshino recalls). Her image only appeared once in a photo taken with Hoshino. Currently there's no more information about her, but some suspect that she was dead, as seen in the Chapter 1 and the Volume Final.
desc.zh_tw: 夢是阿拜多斯前學生會的主席。她曾與星野一起工作，對未來抱有正面的想法（如星野所述）。她本人只在一張與星野一起拍的合照上出現過。當前沒有更多關於她的訊息，但有些人認為她可能已經死了，如在第一篇和最終篇中所呈現的一樣。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 梦是阿拜多斯前学生会的主席。她曾与星野一起工作，对未来抱有正面的想法（如星野所述）。她本人只在一张与星野一起拍的合照上出现过。当前没有更多关于她的消息，但有些人认为她可能已经死了，如在第一篇和最终篇中所呈现的一样。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 梦是阿拜多斯前学生会的主席。她曾与星野一起工作，对未来抱有正面的想法（如星野所述）。她本人只在一张与星野一起拍的合照上出现过。当前没有更多关于她的消息，但有些人认为她可能已经死了，如在第一篇和最终篇中所呈现的一样。

school.jp: アビドス高等学校

hobby.jp: 昼寝、ゴロゴロすること

desc.en: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.jp: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.thai: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.ko: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第五十五首曲子，在第三篇故事中尤为明显。其经常与梓联系起来，后者当时与阿里乌斯(奧利斯)小队作战时因自己“杀了人”而自责。
desc.zh_tw: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.

desc.en: Everyone still couldn't understand what PMC was looking for; after all, high value stuff like oils had long been proved to be non-existed. Shiroko said she wanted to investigate it first, but got Ayane caught to be having the previous idea. Hoshino advised everyone to calm down and returned to take rests first.
desc.jp: Everyone still couldn't understand what PMC was looking for; after all, high value stuff like oils had long been proved to be non-existed. Shiroko said she wanted to investigate it first, but got Ayane caught to be having the previous idea. Hoshino advised everyone to calm down and returned to take rests first.

Shiroko said she wanted to investigate it first, but got Ayane caught to be having the previous idea. Hoshino advised everyone to calm down and returned to take rests first.
desc.zh_tw: 众人还是不理解PMC究竟在找什么，毕竟石油之类的高价值物品已被探明并不存在。白子想先去调查一下，但被綾音识出可能实为去抢银行，遭到阻止。星野让大家冷静下来，先行回去休息。

hobby.jp: 家計簿をつけること、骨董品収集

desc.en: Shiroko and Sensei waited into the nights. Hoshino sent Shiroko away for "being too tired". Sensei remained in the classroom and took out Hoshino's resignation application. Hoshino tried to move the problem onto Shiroko, but Sensei didn't let go. Hoshino agreed to talk about the situation, but first she would like to be out at the corridors.

desc.zh_tw: 白子和老师等到很晚才离开。星野因疲劳打发走了白子，但老师并未离开。老师拿出了星野的退社信，星野想把问题转移到白子上，但老师紧追不放。星野同意向老师讲述情况，但得出去到走廊上。

desc.en: The sandstorm brought much dust into the school corridors. Hoshino coughed a few times and apologized for the lack of manpower. Hoshino then muttered a few words. Sensei said that Hoshino seemed to be really liking Abydos, but got denied by the latter. Then, Hoshino told Sensei about the "deal".

desc.zh_tw: 因为风沙太大，积尘严重，星野咳了几声，表示学校人手实在不够。星野之后又嘀咕了几句。老师说星野看上去非常喜欢阿拜多斯，后者则表示了否定。之后，星野向老师讲出了那个“请求”。

desc.en: It turned out that deal is, if Hoshino's willing to join in PMC (to become a mercenary), then the Black Suit would be willing to take on half of the school's debt.
desc.jp: It turned out that deal is, if Hoshino's willing to join in PMC (to become a mercenary), then the Black Suit would be willing to take on half of the school's debt.
desc.thai: It turned out that deal is, if Hoshino's willing to join in PMC (to become a mercenary), then the Black Suit would be willing to take on half of the school's debt.
desc.ko: It turned out that deal is, if Hoshino's willing to join in PMC (to become a mercenary), then the Black Suit would be willing to take on half of the school's debt.
desc.zh_tw: 原来那个请求便是，如果星野加入PMC（成为佣兵），那么黑服将愿意承担他们学校一半的债务。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 原来那个请求便是，如果星野加入PMC（成为佣兵），那么黑服将愿意承担他们学校一半的债务。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.thai: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.ko: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_tw: 黑色西服人是蔚藍檔案中的反派角色，隸屬於組織“數祕會”。其主要目標是研究基沃託斯中的神祕，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多個故事中均有出現。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.jp: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.thai: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.ko: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第二十七首曲子，尤其用于玩家输掉一场战斗后。
desc.zh_tw: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.

desc.en: Hoshino suspected that PMC (especially the Black Suit) seemed to be hiring some professionals. Hoshino said that she had never seen people like him in Kivotos, and it appeared to her that even Kaiser Director feared him as well. As for the resignation application, Hoshino said it was nothing serious and ripped it apart in front of Sensei. Hoshino said she would made it clear for everyone, but also felt that it was the only option to accept that deal. Before leaving, Sensei made a promise to Hoshino that he would eventually come up with solutions.
desc.jp: Hoshino suspected that PMC (especially the Black Suit) seemed to be hiring some professionals. Hoshino said that she had never seen people like him in Kivotos, and it appeared to her that even Kaiser Director feared him as well. As for the resignation application, Hoshino said it was nothing serious and ripped it apart in front of Sensei. Hoshino said she would made it clear for everyone, but also felt that it was the only option to accept that deal. Before leaving, Sensei made a promise to Hoshino that he would eventually come up with solutions.
desc.thai: Hoshino suspected that PMC (especially the Black Suit) seemed to be hiring some professionals. Hoshino said that she had never seen people like him in Kivotos, and it appeared to her that even Kaiser Director feared him as well. As for the resignation application, Hoshino said it was nothing serious and ripped it apart in front of Sensei. Hoshino said she would made it clear for everyone, but also felt that it was the only option to accept that deal. Before leaving, Sensei made a promise to Hoshino that he would eventually come up with solutions.
desc.ko: Hoshino suspected that PMC (especially the Black Suit) seemed to be hiring some professionals. Hoshino said that she had never seen people like him in Kivotos, and it appeared to her that even Kaiser Director feared him as well. As for the resignation application, Hoshino said it was nothing serious and ripped it apart in front of Sensei. Hoshino said she would made it clear for everyone, but also felt that it was the only option to accept that deal. Before leaving, Sensei made a promise to Hoshino that he would eventually come up with solutions.
desc.zh_tw: 星野推测PMC（尤其是黑服）似乎是在招募一些能手。星野表示她从没在基沃托斯见过他那样的人，而且似乎凯撒集团的理事也很怕他。至于退社信，星野表示只是脑袋一时糊涂，在老师面前撕掉了它。星野还表示明天会和大家说清楚，但又觉得接受那个请求似乎唯一无二。星野走前，老师承诺会想出解决方案。

desc.en: The Millennium Prize, which gives recognition to the Millennium School's best inventions, awards the Game Development Department a special prize for the development of Tales Saga Chronicle 2. Thanks to this, the club is saved from getting shut down. In the midst of everyone's celebrations, the gaming device installed with the G.BIBLE starts to operate on its own.
desc.jp: The Millennium Prize, which gives recognition to the Millennium School's best inventions, awards the Game Development Department a special prize for the development of Tales Saga Chronicle 2. Thanks to this, the club is saved from getting shut down. In the midst of everyone's celebrations, the gaming device installed with the G.BIBLE starts to operate on its own.
desc.thai: The Millennium Prize, which gives recognition to the Millennium School's best inventions, awards the Game Development Department a special prize for the development of Tales Saga Chronicle 2. Thanks to this, the club is saved from getting shut down. In the midst of everyone's celebrations, the gaming device installed with the G.BIBLE starts to operate on its own.
desc.ko: The Millennium Prize, which gives recognition to the Millennium School's best inventions, awards the Game Development Department a special prize for the development of Tales Saga Chronicle 2. Thanks to this, the club is saved from getting shut down. In the midst of everyone's celebrations, the gaming device installed with the G.BIBLE starts to operate on its own.
desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部开发的<传说年代记2>，在选拔千年学园优秀发明的<千年大赏>中获得特别奖，因而免于遊戲開發部的废社危机。在所有人都很开心的时候，安装了<G.Bible>的游戏机自己动了起来。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部开发的<传说年代记2>，在选拔千禧年学园优秀发明的<千禧年大赏>中获得特别奖，因而免于游戏开发部的废社危机。在所有人都很开心的时候，安装了<G.Bible>的游戏机自己动了起来。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部开发的<传说年代记2>，在选拔千年学园优秀发明的<千年大赏>中获得特别奖，因而免于游戏开发部的废社危机。在所有人都很开心的时候，安装了<G.Bible>的游戏机自己动了起来。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部开发的<传说年代记2>，在选拔千年学园优秀发明的<千年大赏>中获得特别奖，因而免于游戏开发部的废社危机。在所有人都很开心的时候，安装了<G.Bible>的游戏机自己动了起来。

desc.en: Aris had a psychological fear on the maid. The damage caused by the combat was carefully handled by the C&C. After everything had all settled, everyone began to watch the live stream of the competition.
desc.jp: Aris had a psychological fear on the maid. The damage caused by the combat was carefully handled by the C&C. After everything had all settled, everyone began to watch the live stream of the competition.
desc.thai: Aris had a psychological fear on the maid. The damage caused by the combat was carefully handled by the C&C. After everything had all settled, everyone began to watch the live stream of the competition.
desc.ko: Aris had a psychological fear on the maid. The damage caused by the combat was carefully handled by the C&C. After everything had all settled, everyone began to watch the live stream of the competition.
desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲对女仆装有了心理阴影，与寧瑠战斗导致的损坏也被他们妥善处理了。尘埃落定后，众人开始观看比赛的现场直播。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝对女仆装有了心理阴影，与尼禄战斗导致的损坏也被他们妥善处理了。尘埃落定后，众人开始观看比赛的现场直播。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝对女仆装有了心理阴影，与宁瑠战斗导致的损坏也被他们妥善处理了。尘埃落定后，众人开始观看比赛的现场直播。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝对女仆装有了心理阴影，与妮露战斗导致的损坏也被他们妥善处理了。尘埃落定后，众人开始观看比赛的现场直播。

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.jp: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.thai: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.ko: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第64首曲子，于“游戏开发部”相关章节中广泛使用。其已经成为游戏开发部及其成员实质上的标志性曲目。
desc.zh_tw: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.

desc.en: The result was announced by Kotori from the Engineering Department. Seven were awarded, but none from the GDD. In despair, Momoi broke the TV with her guns. Everyone was sentimental. Although Yuzu said that she could return to her dorm with courage, Aris became the most worrying one for everyone.
desc.jp: The result was announced by Kotori from the Engineering Department. Seven were awarded, but none from the GDD. In despair, Momoi broke the TV with her guns. Everyone was sentimental. Although Yuzu said that she could return to her dorm with courage, Aris became the most worrying one for everyone.
desc.thai: The result was announced by Kotori from the Engineering Department. Seven were awarded, but none from the GDD. In despair, Momoi broke the TV with her guns. Everyone was sentimental. Although Yuzu said that she could return to her dorm with courage, Aris became the most worrying one for everyone.
desc.ko: The result was announced by Kotori from the Engineering Department. Seven were awarded, but none from the GDD. In despair, Momoi broke the TV with her guns. Everyone was sentimental. Although Yuzu said that she could return to her dorm with courage, Aris became the most worrying one for everyone.
desc.zh_tw: 比赛结果由工程師部的亞都梨发布，总共有七个获奖项目。然而七个播报完都不见开发部的TSC2，桃井绝望之下用枪扫射了屏幕。大家都很感伤，柚子虽然表示自己有勇气回到宿舍，但愛麗絲的去向却成为了众人最担心的一点。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 比赛结果由工程部的柯托莉发布，总共有七个获奖项目。然而七个播报完都不见开发部的TSC2，桃井绝望之下用枪扫射了屏幕。大家都很感伤，柚子虽然表示自己有勇气回到宿舍，但爱丽丝的去向却成为了众人最担心的一点。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 比赛结果由工程师部的亚都梨发布，总共有七个获奖项目。然而七个播报完都不见开发部的TSC2，桃井绝望之下用枪扫射了屏幕。大家都很感伤，柚子虽然表示自己有勇气回到宿舍，但爱丽丝的去向却成为了众人最担心的一点。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 比赛结果由工程部的琴里发布，总共有七个获奖项目。然而七个播报完都不见开发部的TSC2，桃绝望之下用枪扫射了屏幕。大家都很感伤，柚子虽然表示自己有勇气回到宿舍，但爱丽丝的去向却成为了众人最担心的一点。

desc.en: Yuuka visits the GDD, congratulating they won a reward. As the TV was broken, everyone watched the live stream on their phones. On the livestream, the reviewer spoke highly of the elements for a retro RPG that TSC2 possesses, and therefore a special award was given.
desc.jp: Yuuka visits the GDD, congratulating they won a reward. As the TV was broken, everyone watched the live stream on their phones. On the livestream, the reviewer spoke highly of the elements for a retro RPG that TSC2 possesses, and therefore a special award was given.
desc.thai: Yuuka visits the GDD, congratulating they won a reward. As the TV was broken, everyone watched the live stream on their phones. On the livestream, the reviewer spoke highly of the elements for a retro RPG that TSC2 possesses, and therefore a special award was given.
desc.ko: Yuuka visits the GDD, congratulating they won a reward. As the TV was broken, everyone watched the live stream on their phones. On the livestream, the reviewer spoke highly of the elements for a retro RPG that TSC2 possesses, and therefore a special award was given.
desc.zh_tw: 優香拜访遊戲開發部，庆祝所有人取得奖项。因为电视机被打穿，众人在手机上观看了直播。直播中，颁奖员高度赞扬了TSC2作为复古RPG的要素，并由此授予了他们特别奖。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香拜访游戏开发部，庆祝所有人取得奖项。因为电视机被打穿，众人在手机上观看了直播。直播中，颁奖员高度赞扬了TSC2作为复古RPG的要素，并由此授予了他们特别奖。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 优香拜访游戏开发部，庆祝所有人取得奖项。因为电视机被打穿，众人在手机上观看了直播。直播中，颁奖员高度赞扬了TSC2作为复古RPG的要素，并由此授予了他们特别奖。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 优香拜访游戏开发部，庆祝所有人取得奖项。因为电视机被打穿，众人在手机上观看了直播。直播中，颁奖员高度赞扬了TSC2作为复古RPG的要素，并由此授予了他们特别奖。

desc.en: The GDD got rid of the crisis of being closed. Yuuka and Maki expressed their appreciation. The two most upvote comments were nothing but the praise for TSC2. Yuuka announced the decision to postpone the closure and apologized to Momoi. Aris become the member of the GDD formally.
desc.jp: The GDD got rid of the crisis of being closed. Yuuka and Maki expressed their appreciation. The two most upvote comments were nothing but the praise for TSC2. Yuuka announced the decision to postpone the closure and apologized to Momoi. Aris become the member of the GDD formally.
desc.thai: The GDD got rid of the crisis of being closed. Yuuka and Maki expressed their appreciation. The two most upvote comments were nothing but the praise for TSC2. Yuuka announced the decision to postpone the closure and apologized to Momoi. Aris become the member of the GDD formally.
desc.ko: The GDD got rid of the crisis of being closed. Yuuka and Maki expressed their appreciation. The two most upvote comments were nothing but the praise for TSC2. Yuuka announced the decision to postpone the closure and apologized to Momoi. Aris become the member of the GDD formally.
desc.zh_tw: 开发部最终免于废社，就连優香和真紀都给出了好评，最热门的两条评论也满是对TSC2的称赞。優香宣布了暂缓废社的决定，并向桃井抱歉。愛麗絲正式成为开发部成员。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 开发部最终免于废社，就连优香和真纪都给出了好评，最热门的两条评论也满是对TSC2的称赞。优香宣布了暂缓废社的决定，并向桃井抱歉。爱丽丝正式成为开发部成员。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 开发部最终免于废社，就连优香和真纪都给出了好评，最热门的两条评论也满是对TSC2的称赞。优香宣布了暂缓废社的决定，并向桃井抱歉。爱丽丝正式成为开发部成员。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 开发部最终免于废社，就连优香和真纪都给出了好评，最热门的两条评论也满是对TSC2的称赞。优香宣布了暂缓废社的决定，并向桃抱歉。爱丽丝正式成为开发部成员。
